replies.body:
This voice over is amazing. Probably my favorite one this year, including the rework.

Just like his lore describes him the voice acting makes it clear that he doesn't want to interfere and would love to be left alone. 

It makes me want a Mecha Ornn skin so bad. Like imagine this guy in all his Optimus Prime glory.
So many of us want this one day.
I don't know why but it gives me the feeling of what Ramnus would sound like if he had just a couple more lines.
